description: Odd numbers n such that {1..n-1} can be partitioned into disjoint sets I, J with 2I = -J (mod n) such that I, J are unions of cyclotomic cosets mod n.
references: F. J. MacWilliams, A. M. Odlyzko, N. J. A. Sloane and H. N. Ward, Self-Dual Codes over GF(4), J. Combin. Theory, A 25 288-318 1978.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
